messages.subject: Picture of women's brigade
messages.msgSnippet: I was wrong about the picture of the 2 women that Sec so graciously scanned for us-- it turns out, they -are- Nakano Takeko and Nakano Yuuko, but listed under
messages.messageBody:
I was wrong about the picture of the 2 women that Sec so graciously scanned
for us-- it turns out, they -are- Nakano Takeko and Nakano Yuuko, but listed
under their alternate names of Tamagi Yuna (Yuuko), and Akaoka Chikujo
(Takeko).

Am currently compiling a list of all the fighting women of Aizu, Joushigun
(Women's Brigade) or otherwise. Will let you all know when I'm done.

--M.
